Key Match Events: Pakistan's opening partnership of 100 runs between Abdullah Shafique and Fakhar Zaman
Fakhar Zaman marked his return to the side with a belligerent knock of 81 runs
Post-Match Reflections: The defeat, Bangladesh’s sixth, has ended Shakib al-Hasan’s team’s hopes of qualifying for the semifinals
Pakistan have now won three matches from their seven and still have a mathematical chance of qualifying.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan have moved to fifth place in the points table
Bangladesh have only won one match in the tournament
